meanings.definition: A form of protest in which people congregate outside a place of work or other location to demonstrate their opposition or support for a cause.
meanings.sent1: During the picketing, the group held signs and chanted slogans outside the factory.
meanings.sent2: The union organized picketing to demand better working conditions.
meanings.sent3: The picketing turned into a peaceful gathering with music and food stalls.
meanings.sent4: The picketing was a powerful display of unity and determination.
meanings.sent5: The picketing made a lasting impression on the community.

meanings.definition: The action of patrolling or guarding a boundary or perimeter.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers were assigned picketing duty along the border.
meanings.sent2: The security team conducted picketing around the premises to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The picketing by the guards kept intruders away from the restricted area.
meanings.sent4: The picketing of the area was crucial for maintaining security.
meanings.sent5: The picketing helped prevent unauthorized access to the site.
